sentences.en: Add orange paint to get a warmer hue.
sentences.cn: 加些橙色颜料使之略呈暖色.

sentences.en: Differences in hue draw our attention quickly.
sentences.cn: 颜色的不同可以快速的引起我们的注意.

sentences.en: Her cheeks rival the rose in hue.
sentences.cn: 她的双颊颜色可与玫瑰媲美.

sentences.en: His face took on an unhealthy whitish hue.
sentences.cn: 他的脸上透出一丝病态的苍白。

sentences.en: His hair has reverted back to its original copper hue.
sentences.cn: 他的头发又变回原来的淡红棕色。

sentences.en: His red whiskers were dyed of a purple hue.
sentences.cn: 他的红髯子染成了紫色.

sentences.en: His speech has an aggressive hue.
sentences.cn: 他的谈话中有挑衅的意味.

sentences.en: The diamond shone with every hue under the sun.
sentences.cn: 金刚石在阳光下放出五颜六色的光芒.

sentences.en: The pottery is blue with a greenish hue.
The same hue will look different in different light.
sentences.cn: 同一颜色在不同的光线下看起来会有所不同。

sentences.en: The water and the sky are of one hue.
The workers raised a great hue and cry against the new rule.
sentences.cn: 工人们吵吵闹闹反对新规定.

sentences.en: This puts a different hue on the matter.
sentences.cn: 这么一来,事情的性质就不一样了.

sentences.en: White light minus blue light is yellow or red in hue.
sentences.cn: 白光中除去蓝光就呈黄色或红色.

sentences.en: You colour the idea of a prolonged existence in seductive hue.
sentences.cn: 你以引人入胜的色彩描绘了长寿的概念.

phrases.tran_cn: 大声抗议；叫嚣声；追捕犯人时的叫喊声

trans.tran_cn: 色彩，色调，外表，样子，喊叫声，信仰
trans.tran_en: a colour or type of colour
